text: - Since this is a Chetty restaurant, - Yes, we serve chetty cuisines.

Bro, please give me extra dish of rice.

Little bro,

I'm going to the back to give a curious look.
- May I come in? - Yes.
- What are you cooking? - Dosa.
Yep
I haven't seen this restaurant when I came to Latha Street.
Yes, we have opened this restaurant recently. Maybe six months ago.
- There are so many varieties of dishes. - Yep.
- You manage this kitchen by yourself? - Yes, it is.
How many years of work experience do you have?
I have started this work since I was 15 years old.
- You said you had work since your age of 15? - Yes, I'm now 65 years old.
Your age is... 65 years.
If so, you have  work experience of about 50 years.
Yes.
- Did you work in other Indian Restaurants before? - I worked in many other indian restaurants.
I see.  That's why, your dishes are very delicious.
Do you serve  many dishes for ceremonies such as religious donating ceremony?
Yes, we do.
Yes.
You can order what you want; biryani rice, vegetarian dishes or meat curry.
- With various prices. - Yes.
Could we order for birthday party too?
- And when I get married, can I order? - Yes.
- You give discount to me. - Certainly.
Okay.
This boiled milk is for Ceylon Tea?
- Yes, we have Ceylon tea. - Ceylon tea can be ordered?
We also have ginger tea on menu.
Ginger tea is served?
Yes, we serve all kinds of indian traditional cuisine.
Yes, I've heard that Ginger tea aids for digestion.
Yes, it is good for health.
Then, please give me a cup of ginger tea.
I ate too much and now I wanna get digestion aid.
